sample_docs: 9 Innovative Tools Built Into 1 Unified Onboarding Platform Biometric ID Verifications Address Verifications Source of Funds ePayments eSignatures eForms Open Banking KYB Checks Property Searches NFC-based Biometric Verifications Seamless biometric checks using government-graded technology, instantly confirms the identity of an individual within a few minutes using their mobile phone. Automated Address Verifications Ensure your client can prove their address utilising our fast, automated software which includes local and global checks as well as OCR and document checks. Identify Source of Funds Using Advanced AI Analytics Access our source of funds questionnaire and analytics to determine the validity and reliability of an individual's or businesses' funds. Faster Payments and Enhanced Workflows Provide a digital payment portal that gives your clients flexibility and convenience to make instant online payments from digital wallets, credit or debit cards. Send Documents Digitally Through eSignatures Send documents electronically to your clients to read, review and sign. Once completed, access signed documents through our dashboard. Access and Submit Legal Forms Browse through an extensive portfolio of over 2,000 integrated digital legal forms. Send, complete and submit forms with ease. Request Access to Digital Bank Statements Receive your client's bank statements using our FCA-Regulated Open Banking technology with financial analytics to help you better understand client income, source of funds and expenditure. Run Automated Company Checks in Minutes Verify over 500 million UK and international companies within a few minutes to confirm the legitimacy of the business and ultimate beneficial owner (UBO). Thorough Property Searches for Conveyancing Matters Complete comprehensive HM Land Registry searches for residential and commercial properties for all conveyancing transactions Proprietary legal technology, created by legal experts The Biometric ID technology used in the Verify 365 platform is proprietary technology, designed and created within the UK. This means that we fully control the technology; so if and when regulations change, we can quickly and easily adapt our technology with no unexpected downtime so that firms will always be compliant. Find Out More Meet HM Land Registry's Digital ID Standard With the NFC-chip reader verification technology built within the client app, you can verify a person's identity document in seconds. But it's not just about efficiency, NFC verification is also a much more secure method of data validation, which ensures you meet HM Land Registry's Digital ID standard and secure Safe Harbour status. Find Out More Enhanced Due Diligence & Source of Funds Analysis Verify 365 can verify source of funds securely and easily through our FCA-regulated Open Banking technology. It innovatively extracts individual or company transactions and balance data from multiple accounts, using bank-side authentication and consent processes built to transform your AML compliance process and prevent fraud. Find Out More Robina Shah Partner at Optimus Law Verify 365 set up a complete client onboarding experience for our clients from their platform. This made the AML process for our firm quicker and less time-consuming allowing the fee earners to get on with more important tasks. It's a game changer for our law firm and our onboarding time has literally been reduced to minutes. It's also fantastic for our clients who can verify ID remotely. Read More Raminder Uberoi Partner at Starck Uberoi Solicitors Verifying the client's identity and source of funds used to take weeks due to the client needing to collect, print, and send their information in. A quicker way to verify the client had to be implemented. We wanted a system that utilised face biometrics and NFC technology, and a system that enabled our international clients to be properly identified. Verify 365 goes above and beyond any other system. Read More Suezanne King Partner at SMQ Legal Using Verify 365 for our client onboarding process has been phenomenal, we are now onboarding clients in minutes. We now confidently take on clients from anywhere in the world! It takes seconds to send clients a link from the Verify 365 portal and then we wait for the AML report to be generated, whereas previously there was always an element of risk and uncertainty. Read More Laura Everitt Money Laundering Reports Officer at Elite Law The integration has enhanced other departments and helped towards practicing compliantly. We are much happier and are properly protected, knowing our checks are compliant. We have taken specific measures to ensure the safety and security of your and your clients' data mitigating risk of hacking and data leaks. This automated, comprehensive monitoring protects your firm from potential risk and enables you to continue your daily activities without the need to worry. This enables us to make rapid enhancements to our technology however and whenever we need to. This is how Verify 365 was the first piece of software to achieve HM Land Registry's Safe Harbour Standard. We're quickly and easily able to keep up with the rapidly changing legal sector guidelines, meaning our clients will always be compliant. Zagreb Airport is the first in the EU to adopt Digital ID Share: News Verify 365 Zagreb Airport is the first in the EU to adopt Digital ID March 14, 2023 In the European Union, travellers travelling between Zagreb and Helsinki this summer will be the first to test a "pilot project†aimed at digitising travel documentation. To test digital ID travel documents, specialised equipment is being placed at Helsinki and Zagreb airport border controls. On flights between the two cities, passengers will be given access to a mobile application where digital travel documents would be stored. Passengers will provide their Digital ID information through the app to the border inspection officials before they go for their trip so that the documents can be reviewed beforehand. When travellers arrive at the border checkpoint, a photo will be taken and used to link the digital ID travel documents. Once those taking the trip are at the border check, a photo will be taken, which will then be used to connect the digital travel document with the individual. Despite going through this process, it has been stressed that test subjects will still be required to hold a valid passport with them. "Finnair from Finland, the Croatian Ministry for the Interior and the AKD company from Croatia are involved in the project. In addition, the Finnish National Police Administration, the Finnish Immigration Service and Fina via are participating in the project as associated partnersâ€, the Finnish Border Guard said. Verify 365 offers MyID Digital Identity Wallet which can be used to manage your electronic identity and authorisations in one location. Your electronic identity is always available on your mobile phone. You can log and/or sign documents anywhere and anytime. MyID Digital Identity is a safe, secure and convenient way to prove who you are online, to access government online services. Your Digital Identity allows you to prove who you are online for work, education and personal use, and you can re-use your Digital Identity whenever you need it. What makes MyID so easy to use? ~ Works for you. You're always in control of your digital identity. You choose which data to share, with who and when. ~ Everything's in one place. No more searching for lost documents. Store all your identity information securely and access the parts you need instantly. ~ Protects against Identity fraud. With identity theft on the rise, MyID makes sure no one can pretend to be you and commit fraud or other crimes in your name. ~ Verify once, and share again and again. Once MyID has verified your identity, you're verified forever. Then it's easy to share only the details you really need to, whenever you need to. ~ Stops children from accessing age-restricted products. Only over 18s verified using biometrics can get a MyID. So children can't use a fake or borrowed ID to access products and services they shouldn't. ~ Meets the highest security standards. MyID is built using DynamicID technology by Verify 365, certified compliant with ISO/IEC 27001 information security standards and security controls audited using the ISAE 3000 (SOC2) methodology. MyID Digital Identity is a secure and easy way to prove who you are online. You can create your secure Digital Identity, such as MyID, using identity documents like your driver's licence and your passport. Set up MyID Set up your myGovID in 3 easy steps. ~ Contact Verify 365 and request MyID access code. Download the Verify 365 app from the Apple App Store or Google Play. ~ Open the app and follow the prompts to enter your details. ~ Verify your ID biometric NFC document with at least 2 proof of address documents to get verified MyID. MyID uses encryption and cryptographic technology and the security features in your device, such as fingerprint or face, to protect your identity. You're in control as your personal information is only shared with your consent. Zagreb Airport is the first in the EU to adopt Digital ID Share: News Verify 365 Zagreb Airport is the first in the EU to adopt Digital ID March 14, 2023 In the European Union, travellers travelling between Zagreb and Helsinki this summer will be the first to test a "pilot project†aimed at digitising travel documentation. To test digital ID travel documents, specialised equipment is being placed at Helsinki and Zagreb airport border controls. On flights between the two cities, passengers will be given access to a mobile application where digital travel documents would be stored. Passengers will provide their Digital ID information through the app to the border inspection officials before they go for their trip so that the documents can be reviewed beforehand. When travellers arrive at the border checkpoint, a photo will be taken and used to link the digital ID travel documents. Once those taking the trip are at the border check, a photo will be taken, which will then be used to connect the digital travel document with the individual. Despite going through this process, it has been stressed that test subjects will still be required to hold a valid passport with them. "Finnair from Finland, the Croatian Ministry for the Interior and the AKD company from Croatia are involved in the project. In addition, the Finnish National Police Administration, the Finnish Immigration Service and Fina via are participating in the project as associated partnersâ€, the Finnish Border Guard said.
